text: Yappity-yap~ It's Francis!
I always get many comments on the recipes I post on YouTube.
Some of them make you feel and realize the differences in food cultures, and they are quite interesting!
Hey, everyone! The eggs being sold in Japan are OK to eat raw!
In order to find out more about how these eggs are produced,
I am already on my way!
Today, we are visiting the Japan Poultry Farmers Association!
They are engaged in various activities related to eggs and chicken that are useful for our food diet.
I have got to listen well!
So, putting the raw egg on rice is a unique way of eating.
In order to enjoy raw eggs, they have got to be safe!
To safely deliver delicious eggs, what kind of rules are there?
Safe eggs come from healthy chickens.
Everything is really well-controlled.
Even if best-before dates have passed, they can still be eaten if you cook them well.
Please teach us how to tell if eggs are fresh!
In the past, people used to say you shouldn't eat too many eggs...
However...
Eggs are well-balanced, nutritional foods!
Full of nutrition, they are recommended for people who are on a diet.
I want everyone to try delicious Japanese eggs!
I should be appealing Japanese eggs to everyone more!
To do that, I need to know what delicious eggs taste like!
I am going to eat the most delicious eggs!
